data.name: 0000 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I just suddenly thought...

data.name: 0001 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi is surely number one in the brigade when it comes to criticizing other's ideas.

data.name: 0002 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh? What are you talking about?

data.name: 0003 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well I suggest all these ideas, right?

data.name: 0004 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And whenever I do he does nothing but nitpick back at me.

data.name: 0005 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wonder if that's just his personality.

data.name: 0006 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …I don't really get what you're trying to say, but...

data.name: 0007 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, isn't that simply because your ideas are flawed?

data.name: 0009 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And for the record, Koizumi is an excellent advisor type.

data.name: 0010 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you blame all your inadequacies on Koizumi, you'll forever remain a low-ranking member.

data.name: 0011 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You need to learn from Koizumi a little.

data.name: 0012 (195.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let sleeping dogs lie, or whatever it is…

data.name: 0013 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: The SOS Brigade truly has a lot of different people--Different types of people.

data.name: 0014 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's this all of a sudden again?

data.name: 0015 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I just was thinking--We have a quiet person like Nagato…

data.name: 0016 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We even have an opinionated person like Koizumi. We're really brimming with variety.

data.name: 0017 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So you're saying Yuki is a quiet type, and Koizumi is an adviser?

data.name: 0018 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-well, I'm not so sure about him being an adviser…

data.name: 0019 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Someone who challenges the leader's suggestions to fill the holes in the strategy.

data.name: 0020 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, so that's what you meant.

data.name: 0021 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We do also have a good-for-nothing complainer type though.

data.name: 0022 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-who might you be talking about...?

data.name: 0023 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And a scaredy-cat clutz like you, Mikuru.

data.name: 0024 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeek…

data.name: 0025 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look, we can't waste our breath chatting--we need to hurry to the music room! Dash!

data.name: 0026 (195.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes...

data.name: 0027 (195.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Opinion poll. I'd like to ask about Itsuki Koizumi.

data.name: 0028 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What's brought this about, all of a sudden?

data.name: 0029 (195.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Nothing in particular.

data.name: 0030 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's unusual for you to raise your voice on a whim. Sure though, what is it?

data.name: 0031 (195.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Is Itsuki Koizumi opinionated?

data.name: 0032 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Opinionated...? It's the first I've heard of it. What do you mean?

data.name: 0033 (195.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: He's the type that sees through a proposal's flaws and gives harsh opinions.

data.name: 0034 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh, that's what you mean. I see... He is certainly a bit like that.

data.name: 0035 (195.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: To put it another way, he's the type to nitpick?

data.name: 0036 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You heard that from Kyon, didn't you?

data.name: 0038 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's problematic even for Kyon. I'll have to give him a lecture later.

data.name: 0039 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's something I'd like to ask you, Miss Suzumiya…

data.name: 0040 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Me? What is it?

data.name: 0041 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'd like to apologize in advance for it being so personal.

data.name: 0042 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm not self-aware about it, but it seems I have a habit of making needless interjections.

data.name: 0043 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Needless interjections?

data.name: 0044 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, needless interjections.

data.name: 0045 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For example, where one makes a suggestion and I raise my concerns…

data.name: 0046 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To put it plainly, it seems I'm regarded as nitpicking a lot.

data.name: 0047 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder if you think so too, Miss Suzumiya?

data.name: 0048 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Me? I've never thought that way about you at all.

data.name: 0049 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm greatly relieved to hear that.

data.name: 0050 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was Kyon saying it, right? I can't imagine it from anyone else.

data.name: 0051 (195.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll give him a stern scolding later.

data.name: 0052 (195.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well that's... If you say so. Deary me.
